title: VEGAS Movie Studio 17
description: VEGAS movie Studio 17 makes advanced video editing easy. The new guided video Creator helps you to create films in just a few steps while still allowing access to advanced tools for when you need to take your film to the next level. Experience smooth video previews in the highest quality thanks to GPU acceleration. Automatically remove black bars in Vertical videos from your smartphone using the black bar fill filter. Find and organize the numerous effects and transitions more easily now with the help of new effects window.
